scripts.test-cov: NODE_ENV=test CONFO_FILE=./test/confo.json istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --check-leaks --reporter dot test/
scripts.test-travis: NODE_ENV=test CONFO_FILE=./test/confo.json istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --check-leaks --reporter spec test/
